intro: Psychotria anomovenosa, commonly known as the red psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests. The plant's botanical features make it an important species in ecological studies and traditional medicine.
